DOC.brief_title: Personalized Hemodynamic Therapy Patients Undergoing High-risk Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥ 18 year undergo major abdominal procedure ( include general , urological , gynaecological , vascular ) expect duration surgery ≥ 90 min presume blood loss exceed 1,000 mL ( e.g. , intrabdominal vascular surgery ) ≥ 1 follow highrisk criterion : acute chronic renal impairment ( serum creatinine ≥ 1.3 mg/dL ) predefined risk factor cardiac respiratory complication Immunodeficiency due therapy ( e.g. , immunosuppressant , chemotherapy , radiation , longterm highdose steroid ) Immunodeficiency due specific disease ( e.g. , leukaemia , lymphoma , AIDS ) severe liver impairment ( biopsy proven liver cirrhosis plus 1 following : portal hypertension history upper gastrointestinal bleeding due portal hypertension previous episode hepatic insufficiency/hepatic encephalopathy/hepatic coma Age ≥ 80 year Age < 18 year Pregnancy surgery palliative treatment emergency procedure refusal consent participation another randomize control trial failure meet inclusion criterion
